title.rendered: A Winter Escape: Exclusive Packages with Crossbasket Castle

content.rendered:
Experience the perfect blend of culture, luxury, and comfort this winter with our bespoke chauffeur-driven escapes.

This winter, we’re thrilled to collaborate with the stunning Crossbasket Castle to offer two exclusive packages that promise a magical blend of luxury, culture, and relaxation. Whether you’re dreaming of sparkling diamonds or a night at the ballet, we’ve created the perfect winter escape. Plus, with our chauffeur-driven services, your journey will be as luxurious as your destination.

Champagne & Diamonds Package

Spoil yourself with the Champagne & Diamonds package, perfect for those who appreciate the finer things in life. Upon arrival at Crossbasket Castle, you’ll be welcomed with a glass of champagne before being chauffeured to ROX, one of Scotland’s premier jewellers, where you’ll enjoy not only a private diamond consultation but also get a £1000 voucher to spend.

Afterward, relax in the castle’s opulent rooms and indulge in gourmet dining. Our chauffeur service ensures that every detail of your journey is smooth, elegant, and stress-free.

What’s included:

  • Champagne reception upon arrival.
  • Chauffeur-driven transfer to and from ROX.
  • Private diamond consultation at ROX with a £1000 voucher.
  • Luxurious overnight and gourmet dining.

Theatre Thrills & Castle Stays

For a cultural and magical winter experience, the Theatre Thrills package offers an enchanting evening at the Theatre Royal for a performance of The Nutcracker by the Scottish Ballet. After the show, your chauffeur will whisk you back to Crossbasket Castle for a peaceful night of luxury in one of their stunning suites.

This package combines the thrill of world-class ballet with the elegance and comfort of a castle stay, making it the ideal winter escape.

What’s included:

  • Chauffeur-driven transfers to and from the Theatre Royal.
  • Premium tickets to The Nutcracker by the Scottish Ballet.
  • Luxurious overnight and dining.

Both packages deliver the very best of Scottish luxury and culture, enhanced by our bespoke chauffeur services. Whether you’re celebrating a special occasion or simply seeking a winter escape, we’re here to make your journey just as extraordinary as your stay.

Book your exclusive winter package today through the Crossbasket Castle website.

Back to News
